text: Allah ne Hasken sammai da ƙasa, misalin HaskenSa, kamar taga, a cikinta akwai fitila, fitilar a cikin ƙarau, ƙarau ɗin kamar shi tauraro ne mai tsananin haske, ana kunna shi daga wata itaciya mai albarka, ta zaituni, ba bagabashiya ba kuma ba bayammaciya ba, manta na kusa ya yi haske, kuma ko wuta ba ta shafe shi ba, haske a kan haske, Allah na shiryar da wanda Yake so zuwa ga HaskenSa.
